The fixture is mounted on a polished gold circular backplate with a clear, decorative frill-like edge. This sconce offers a glamorous and sophisticated look, perfect for adding an elegant touch to an interior space.
Finish: Polished gold with faceted clear and patterned shades

Name: Modern Crystal Cylinder Wall Sconce
Dep: A modern double-light wall sconce featuring a central matte black metal band and two faceted, clear crystal-like cylindrical shades. One shade is on the top and one is on the bottom, both housing a light source. This fixture provides a sparkling and elegant lighting effect, perfect for contemporary spaces or hallways.
Finish: Matte black with faceted clear shades

Name: Modern Bubble Oval Wall Sconce
Dep: A modern single-light wall sconce featuring a curved, translucent, oval-shaped acrylic shade with a decorative bubble-like or sparkling texture. The shade wraps around a central polished gold-toned bar, which houses the light source and is mounted on a small circular backplate. This fixture creates a glamorous and unique lighting effect, ideal for contemporary living spaces.
Finish: Polished gold with a clear bubble-textured shade

Name: Industrial Edison Style Pendant Light Bulbs
Dep: A set of vintage-style Edison light bulbs, each with a unique glass shape and an intricate spiral filament design. The bulbs are suspended from black cords and feature a knurled, textured bronze or antique brass metal fitting at the top. This collection offers a stylish and industrial look, perfect for creating a statement piece in a dining area or over a kitchen island.
Finish: Antique brass/bronze with clear glass

Name: Industrial & Vintage Lighting Collection
Dep: A diverse collection of industrial and vintage-style lighting, including hanging pendant lights and table lamps. The fixtures feature various metal cages, natural wood bases, and exposed Edison bulbs with intricate filaments. This assortment is ideal for creating a curated, eclectic feel in a modern or retro-themed space.
Finish: Matte black, natural wood, and clear/amber glass

Name: Industrial Edison Bulb Table Lamp
Dep: A set of three vintage-style Edison light bulbs, each with a different glass shape and intricate filament design, mounted on a single rectangular wooden base. This unique table lamp offers an industrial and vintage aesthetic, perfect for a desk or side table.
Finish: Natural wood with clear/amber glass bulbs

Name: Edison Filament Bulb Assortment
Dep: A collection of images showcasing various Edison-style filament bulbs in different settings. The bulbs, which come in multiple shapes like globe and elongated, feature a visible spiral filament. They are shown with different fixtures, including a table lamp with a black base and a hanging pendant light with a bronze or brass-toned fitting.
Finish: Matte black and bronze with clear/amber glass

Name: Diamond Shape Filament LED Bulb
Dep: A single vintage-style filament LED bulb with a unique faceted, diamond-like shape. The clear amber glass showcases a linear LED filament, providing a warm and decorative glow.
Finish: Clear glass with a warm glow

Name: Heart Shape Filament LED Bulb
Dep: A single vintage-style filament LED bulb with a unique heart shape. The clear amber glass showcases a spiral filament, providing a warm and decorative glow.
Finish: Clear glass with a warm glow

Name: Tubular Filament LED Bulb
Dep: A single vintage-style filament LED bulb with a unique horizontal, tubular shape. The clear amber glass showcases a linear LED filament, providing a warm and decorative glow.
Finish: Clear glass with a warm glow

Name: ST64 Filament LED Bulb
Dep: A vintage-style filament LED bulb with the classic ST64 pear shape. The clear amber glass showcases multiple linear LED filaments, providing a warm and decorative glow. This bulb is perfect for open fixtures where the bulb itself is a design feature.
Finish: Clear glass with a warm glow

Name: Spiral Filament Corn Cob LED Bulbs
Dep: A pair of modern LED bulbs with a unique corn cob shape. They feature a spiral arrangement of both yellow and white LED chips visible through a clear cover. The base is a combination of copper/bronze and silver metal. These bulbs offer a modern and industrial look, ideal for use in open fixtures.
Finish: Copper and silver on the base with a clear cover

Name: Long Tubular Filament LED Bulb
Dep: A single vintage-style filament LED bulb with a unique long, tubular shape. The clear amber glass showcases multiple linear LED filaments, providing a warm and decorative glow. It is shown attached to a black pendant-style fixture with a knurled base.
Finish: Matte black with clear/amber glass

Name: Classic Filament LED Bulbs
Dep: A group of three classic A-shaped LED bulbs, which have a clear glass casing and visible vertical LED filaments that mimic traditional incandescent filaments. These bulbs provide a warm, decorative glow with the energy efficiency of modern LED technology.
Finish: Clear glass with a warm glow and a silver base

Name: Flame Tip Filament LED Bulbs
Dep: A group of three candle-shaped LED bulbs with a unique flame-like curved tip. The clear glass casings show visible yellow LED filaments, and the bulbs have a silver threaded base. These bulbs combine a classic aesthetic with modern energy-efficient technology.
Finish: Clear glass with a warm glow and a silver base

Name: Classic Candle Filament LED Bulbs
Dep: A group of three candle-shaped LED bulbs with a clear glass casing. The bulbs feature visible vertical LED filaments, providing a warm decorative glow similar to traditional incandescent bulbs. They have a silver threaded base, combining a vintage look with modern energy efficiency.
Finish: Clear glass with a warm glow and a silver base
